# StatusWidget API

::: email_widget.widgets.status_widget.StatusWidget
    options:
        show_root_heading: true
        show_source: false
        heading_level: 3
        filters:
          - "!^_"
          - "!^.*args$"
          - "!^.*kwargs$"

## Status Item (StatusItem)

::: email_widget.widgets.status_widget.StatusItem
    options:
        show_root_heading: true
        show_source: false
        heading_level: 4
        filters:
          - "!^_"
          - "!^.*args$"
          - "!^.*kwargs$"
